name: English Vocabulary Words - Core vocabulary
description: Learn and master 3000 English core vocabulary: All you need to master English Vocabulary Words is this app.  **Features of Core vocabulary** + Added game for learn vocabulary easy ( text ->image, image->text, text->text ) + Share app with your friends + Auto download word + Support dictionary + Display the study results by chart + Memory game   **More category for you** +Animal +Clothing +Emotions +Drinks +Food +Fruit +Furniture +Insects +Music +Ocean  Core vocabulary is suitable for all ages, will give you the feeling of being happy Thank you for using it
